title: PVP.net Patcher Kernel Stopped Working.
body:
Hello :3

When im trying to launch the client, im getting the error in the title, and then when i press close im just going back to the desktop. It has been like that for a few days now. I have tried reinstalling, it didnt work, tried opening the client as administor, didnt work either. 

Somebody has a solution? should i just wait for the next patch?

Thanks!

replies.body: Hi there!  This error you're seeing is usually caused by a security setting that's blocking league from launching.  You'll want to go over each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore access and add the game as an exception.  I hope that helps!
